profile:
Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is an established company with a proven track record. We specialize in comfort solutions and also respond quickly to no heating calls, no cooling calls, leaking water heaters, and we service and install furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters, thermostats, indoor air quality products resolving indoor air quality issues or problems with mould, ventilation and other indoor air common problems. We have 17 years of experience in this industry and deliver the best quality workmanship. Any HVAC Issues big or small Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is the company to call. We also have a Master Electrician and a Certified Plumber on staff as well to help you with any issues you have with your electrical or plumbing needs at home from replacing electrical panels, safety inspections, replacing toilets, sinks, fixing leaks or installing hot water tanks to boiler systems.

   â€œ All electrical work is subcontracted to ECRA/ESA Licensed Electrical Contractors. "

BOSS Mechanical Inc. is a licensed and registered heating and air conditioning company.  We serve the Brampton, GTA, Mississauga, Halton Region, Markham, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Hamilton, Oakville, Burlington, Ancaster and all surrounding areas to provide the highest quality in HVAC services and installation.  If you are looking for expert contractors, fast service and quality products call us today!

â˜†â˜†â˜†HIGH QUALITY SERVICESâ˜†â˜†â˜†
BOSS Mechanical Inc. is a consumer driven company who pride ourselves on providing high quality HVAC solutions, cleanliness, professional services and affordable rates to help give our customers peace of mind.

â˜†â˜†â˜†QUALIFIED TECHNICIANSâ˜†â˜†â˜†
All our technicians are licensed, knowledgeable, skilled installers with experienced workmanship.  We are committed to providing total customer satisfaction, whatever the weather may be.  Your satisfaction is our goal!
